ygData.subject: Re: Verant Solution to Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Making all items NO DROP will not solve the problem.  Last week, I was down in LG, helping ppl in my group get a guise of the deciever.  When we first zoned in
ygData.messageBody:
Making all items NO DROP will not solve the problem. Last week, I was down
in LG, helping ppl in my group get a guise of the deciever. When we first
zoned in we noticed there was a lvl 11 troll warrior down there with other
ppl from a certain guild. Turns out they are twinking him a mask. Well, I
nor my group would have anything to do with this so we walked in and took the
room in the temple. Because they had the lvl 11, they couldn't camp the
room, or at least hadn't gotten to it yet, so were forced to pull from the
bridge. Needless to say it rather pissed them off. We said we would give
them the first mask IF it was for one of them, but it wasn't and they kept
bitching about how we stole their camp. Guilds got involved, a person quit
their guild for camping NO DROP items to twink. Point of the story is, you
can still twink ppl with NO DROP items. Only think I can think of to change
it is to put lvl limits on items.

Kanja Dragonfist
